name: honeymoon
title: Honeymoon in Costa Rica
description: We flew to Costa Rica right after the wedding for 10 days of pure enjoyment. To our great surprise, the trip was mostly paid for by our honeymoon fund. THANK YOU to all of our lovely guests who contributed!

name: bend_n_back
title: Trip to Bend, OR
description: In early June 2021, Sean and Mary Kate went on a 'pre-honeymoon' road trip up to Bend, OR and back with some camping hiking, and thin spaces along the way.

name: paintball
title: Bachelor Party Paintball
description: The crew went paintballing for Sean's bachelor party. It was full day of exhilariting fun and a healthy dose of fear that got the adrenaline pumping.
